/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. A large tree stands majestically in the center of the frame, its leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. To the right, a tall apartment building reaches towards the sky, its windows reflecting the sunlight. On the left, a smaller building with a red roof adds a splash of color to the scene. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
